quote.quote: Where you can starve to death in safety
Think the old man was feeling sentimental this morning
Well we all feel a little closer today dont we
We could do it you know
You and I we could make it
If we didnt have so many kids
I never want to have kids
What do you want to do
We can leave our poles and gather in the woods
Once its in the soup Ill call it beef
Well if I end up going to the Capitol I want to look nice dont I
You wont be going to the Capitol
I had six when I was just twelve years old
Its to the Capitols advantage to have us divided among ourselves
Lets put your hair up too
Tuck your tail in little duck
Look how we take your children and sacrifice them and theres nothing you can do
If you lift a finger we will destroy every last one of you
Just as we did in District Thirteen
It is both a time for repentance and a time for thanks
And may the odds be ever in your favor
But there are still thousands of slips
But I believe theres a small matter of introducing the reaping winner and then asking for volunteers and if one does come forth then we um
Thats the spirit of the Games
I bet my buttons that was your sister
Dont want her to steal all the glory do we
Lets give a big round of applause to our newest tribute
Its time to choose our boy tribute
Feed it to the pig you stupid creature
No one decent will buy burned bread
Well you have to help it this time
You cant clock out and leave Prim on her own
Theres no me now to keep you both alive
Whatever you see on the screen
You have to promise me youll fight through it
I could have treated myself if Id had the medicine I have now
But you have to take care too
Then wed be rich as Haymitch
I dont care if were rich
I just want you to come home
I had some of your bread this morning
My friend Gale gave you a squirrel for it
Ill keep an eye on the little girl
They let you wear one thing from your district in the arena
One thing to remind you of home
Here Ill put it on your dress all right
Promise youll wear it into the arena Katniss
Getting a knife should be pretty easy but youve got to get your hands on a bow
Even a weak bow is better than no bow at all
I dont even know if therell be wood
Since that year half of them died of cold
Youre the best hunter I know
How different can it be really
Last time I saw him he said he was going to take a nap
Well its been an exhausting day
At least you two have decent manners
The pair last year ate everything with their hands like a couple of savages
Your mentor has a lot to learn about presentation
How odd you two find it amusing
You know your mentor is your lifeline to the world in these Games
The one who advises you lines up your sponsors and dictates the presentation of any gifts
Haymitch can well be the difference between your life and your death
Lets get you back to your room
I can send one of the Capitol people to help you
What other food can we find
I just have to remember them
As long as you can find yourself youll never starve
Its going to be a big big big day
I wont unless I bring it home
So youre supposed to give us advice
Did I actually get a pair of fighters this year
The audience will think youve mixed it up with another tribute before youve even made it to the arena
That bruise will say you fought you werent caught even better
Can you hit anything with that knife besides a table
And once the stylists get hold of you youll be attractive enough
All right Ill make a deal with you
You dont interfere with my drinking and Ill stay sober enough to help you
But you have to do exactly what I say
When we get to the arena whats the best strategy at the Cornucopia for someone
In a few minutes well be pulling into the station
Youll be put in the hands of your stylists
Youre not going to like what they do to you
But no matter what it is dont resist
One of them may be rich
If theres one thing we cant stand its a whiner
You almost look like a human being now
We dont have much cause to look nice in District Twelve
Of course you dont you poor darling
By the time Cinna is through with you youre going to be absolutely gorgeous
You know now that weve gotten rid of all the hair and filth youre not horrible at all
Just give me a moment all right
And in almost perfect balance with your profile
I dont think Ive seen you before
Yes this is my first year in the Games
So they gave you District Twelve
Why dont you put on your robe and well have a chat
How despicable we must seem to you
So Katniss about your costume for the opening ceremonies
My partner Portia is the stylist for your fellow tribute Peeta
And our current thought is to dress you in complementary costumes
As you know its customary to reflect the flavor of the district
So Ill be in a coal miner outfit
You see Portia and I think that coal miner things very overdone
No one will remember you in that
And we both see it as our job to make the District Twelve tributes unforgettable
So rather than focus on the coal mining itself were going to focus on the coal
And what do we do with coal
Youre not afraid of fire are you Katniss
Its not real flame of course just a little synthetic fire Portia and I came up with
I want the audience to recognize you when youre in the arena
Katniss the girl who was on fire
Ill rip off your cape if youll rip off mine
I know we promised Haymitch wed do exactly what they said but I dont think he considered this angle
Isnt he supposed to protect us from this sort of thing
With all that alcohol in him its probably not advisable to have him around an open flame
I think he said for us to hold hands
No dont let go of me
I might fall out of this thing
Thanks for keeping hold of me
I was getting a little shaky there
Im sure they didnt notice anything but you
You should wear flames more often
Because of course Haymitch hasnt bothered to tell me your strategies
But Ive done my best with what I had to work with
How Katniss sacrificed herself for her sister
How youve both successfully struggled to overcome the barbarism of your district
Unfortunately I cant seal the sponsor deals for you
But dont worry Ill get him to the table at gunpoint if necessary
Thats the last thing I wa oh
How could you possibly know an Avox
They cut her tongue so she cant speak
Shes probably a traitor of some sort
And even if you did youre not to speak to one of them unless its to give an order
Of course you dont really know her
No I guess not I just
I kept thinking she looked familiar as well
Then I realized shes a dead ringer for Delly
Of course thats who I was thinking of
And yes the cake has spirits but all the alcohol has burned off
I ordered it specially in honor of your fiery debut
Whose idea was the hand holding
Just the perfect touch of rebellion
Tomorrow morning is the first training session
Meet me for breakfast and Ill tell you exactly how I want you to play it
Now go get some sleep while the grownups talk
Have you been on the roof yet
You can practically see the whole city
The winds a bit loud though
No one will overhear us talking
I asked Cinna why they let us up here
Werent they worried that some of the tributes might decide to jump right over the side
Some kind of electric field throws you back on the roof
Do you think theyre watching us now
We were hunting in the woods one day
Suddenly all the birds stopped singing at once
As if it were giving a warning call
Im sure it was the same girl
They had dark circles under their eyes from no sleep
They were running as if their lives depended on it
The hovercraft appeared out of nowhere
I mean one moment the sky was empty and the next it was there
It didnt make a sound but they saw it
A net dropped down on the girl and carried her up fast so fast like the elevator
They shot some sort of spear through the boy
It was attached to a cable and they hauled him up as well
But Im certain he was dead
We heard the girl scream once
Then it was gone the hovercraft
And the birds began to sing again as if nothing had happened
We were under a shelf of rock
Where do you suppose they were going
Or why they would leave here
Id go home now if they let me
But you have to admit the foods prime
Hes the one who took your sister away at the reaping
I hear the girls talk about him a lot
I thought he was your cousin or something
Did he come to say goodbye to you
Well he likes you and your sister
I think he wishes he had a daughter instead of a houseful of boys
He knew your mother when they were kids
See you in the morning then
I was supposed to get those back to Cinna
Can you take them to him
So lets get down to business
First off if you like Ill coach you separately
Why would you coach us separately
Say if you had a secret skill you might not want the other to know about
I dont have any secret skills
And I already know what yours is right
I mean Ive eaten enough of your squirrels
All right so give me some idea of what you can do
I already know youre handy with a knife
He always comments on how the arrows never pierce the body
She hits every one in the eye
Its the same with the rabbits she sells the butcher
She can even bring down deer
If hes going to help you he has to know what youre capable of
Ive seen you in the market
You can lift hundredpound bags of flour
Yes and Im sure the arena will be full of bags of flour for me to chuck at people
Its not like being able to use a weapon
He came in second in our school competition last year only after his brother
How many times have you seen someone wrestle someone to death
All you need is to come up with a knife and youll at least stand a chance
If I get jumped Im dead
Youll be living up in some tree eating raw squirrels and picking off people with arrows
You know what my mother said to me when she came to say goodbye as if to cheer me up she says maybe District Twelve will finally have a winner
Then I realized she didnt mean me she meant you
She said Shes a survivor that one
But only because someone helped me
People will help you in the arena
Theyll be tripping over each other to sponsor you
Katniss theres no guarantee theyll be bows and arrows in the arena but during your private session with the Gamemakers show them what you can do
Until then stay clear of archery
Are you any good at trapping
I know a few basic snares
That may be significant in terms of food
And Peeta shes right never underestimate strength in the arena
Very often physical power tilts the advantage to a player
In the Training Center they will have weights but dont reveal how much you can lift in front of the other tributes
The plans the same for both of you
Spend the time trying to learn something you dont know
Learn to tie a decent knot
Save showing what youre best at until your private sessions
In public I want you by each others side every minute
You agreed to do as I said
You will be together you will appear amiable to each other
Meet Effie at the elevator at ten for training
Where would you like to start
The iced ones for the bakery
If only you could frost someone to death
You can never tell what youll find in the arena
Say its actually a gigantic cake
Okay now laugh as if Ive said something funny
All right Ill keep smiling pleasantly and you talk
Did I ever tell you about the time I was chased by a bear
I think we have a shadow
What can we do about it
Someone ought to get Haymitch a drink
Dont lets pretend when theres no one around
Remember what Haymitch said about being sure to throw the weights
Okay enough small talk just how bad were you today
I dont know that it mattered
By the time I showed up no one even bothered to look at me
They were singing some kind of drinking song I think
So I threw around some heavy objects until they told me I could go
I shot an arrow at the Gamemakers
I shot an arrow at them
Its like Peeta said I was shooting and they were ignoring me and I just
I just lost my head so I shot an apple out of their stupid roast pigs mouth
Do you think theyll arrest me
Be a pain to replace you at this stage
See theyd have to reveal what happened in the Training Center for it to have any worthwhile effect on the population
People would need to know what you did
But they cant since its secret so itd be a waste of effort
More likely theyll make your life hell in the arena
Well theyve already promised to do that to us any way
One man tripped backward into a bowl of punch
Its their job to pay attention to you
And just because you come from District Twelve is no excuse to ignore you
Im sorry but thats what I think
Ill get a very bad score
Scores only matter if theyre very good no one pays much attention to the bad or mediocre ones
For all they know you could be hiding your talents to get a low score on purpose
I hope thats how people interpret the four Ill probably get
Really is anything less impressive than watching a person pick up a heavy ball and throw it a couple of yards
One almost landed on my foot
Theyve got a show to put on
They need some players with some heat
Katniss the girl who was on fire
Oh wait until you see your interview dress
Well Catnip stealings punishable by death or hadnt you heard
I just wanted to look at your snare
So whered you get the squirrel
Just remember stealings punishable by death
Well theres some room for improvement there
Youre coaching us on interviews today right
You dont have to wait until Im done
I can listen and cat at the same time
Well theres been a change of plans
Peeta has asked to be coached separately
Youll each have four hours with Effie for presentation and four with me for content
Well thats the best I can do
Just remember Katniss you want the audience to like you
And you dont think they will
Not if you glare at them the entire time
Why dont you save that for the arena
Instead think of yourself among friends
Theyre betting on how long Ill live
Im smiling at you even though youre aggravating me
Im trying to figure out what to do with you
How were going to present you
Are you going to be charming
So far youre shining like a star
You volunteered to save your sister
Youve got the top training score
People are intrigued but no one knows who you are
The impression you make tomorrow will decide exactly what I can get you in terms of sponsors
Or am I not allowed to ask
He has a sort of selfdeprecating humor naturally
Whereas when you open your mouth you come across more as sullen and hostile
I dont know where you pulled that cheery wavy girl on the chariot from but I havent seen her before or since
And youve given me so many reasons to be cheery
But you dont have to please me
Im not going to sponsor you
Weve got to find another angle
Not only are you hostile I dont know anything about you
Ive asked you fifty questions and still have no sense of your life your family what you care about
They want to know about you Katniss
But I dont want them to
They cant have the things that mattered to me in the past
Youve got about as much charm as a dead slug
That you cant believe a little girl from District Twelve has done this well
The whole things been more than you ever could have dreamed of
If you wont talk about yourself at least compliment the audience
Just keep turning it back around all right
Just answer the questions and try not to let the audience see how openly you despise them
I should have tried to save you
So all ready for the interview then
Haymitch called me a dead slug
No matter what we tried I couldnt do it
I just cant be one of those people he wants me to be
Why dont you just be yourself
Haymitch says Im sullen and hostile
You even won over the Gamemakers
And as for the citizens of the Capitol well they cant stop talking about you
No one can help but admire your spirit
Suppose when you answer the questions you think youre addressing a friend back home
Who would your best friend be
Only it doesnt make sense Cinna
I would never be telling Gale those things about me
Could you think of me as a friend
Ill be sitting on the main platform with the other stylists
Youll be able to look right at me
When youre asked a question find me and answer it as honestly as possible
Even if what I think is horrible
Especially if what you think is horrible
Remember youre still a happy pair
And if they cant catch me they cant kill me
I wouldnt in a million years
So Katniss the Capitol must be quite a change from District Twelve
Whats impressed you most since you arrived here
Whats impressed you most since you arrived here
The one with the dried plums
Oh I eat it by the bucketful
When you came out in the opening ceremonies my heart actually stopped
What did you think of that costume
You mean after I got over my fear of being burned alive
I thought Cinna was brilliant and it was the most gorgeous costume Id ever seen and I couldnt believe I was wearing it
I cant believe Im wearing this either
Cant have you following in your mentors footsteps
So how about that training score
Give us a hint what happened in there
all I can say is I think it was a first
Im not supposed to talk about it right
Lets go back then to the moment they called your sisters name at the reaping
Can you tell us about her
And I love her more than anything
What did she say to you
She asked me to try really hard to win
Best of luck Katniss Everdeen tribute from District Twelve
Tell me do I still smell like roses
There must be some special girl
Well there is this one girl
Ive had a crush on her ever since I can remember
But Im pretty sure she didnt know I was alive until the reaping
I dont know but a lot of boys like her
She cant turn you down then eh
I dont think its going to work out
Oh that is a piece of bad luck
Well I dont think any of us can blame you
Itd be hard not to fall for that young lady
Wouldnt you love to pull her back out here and get a response
Sadly rules are rules and Katniss Everdeens time has been spent
Well best of luck to you Peeta Mellark and I think I speak for all of Panem when I say our hearts go with yours
No right to go saying those things about me
This was your idea wasnt it
Turning me into some kind of fool in front of the entire country
Haymitch just helped me with it
Do you think he hurt you
That boy just gave you something you could never achieve on your own
And lets face it you can use all the help you can get in that department
You were about as romantic as dirt until he said he wanted you
The starcrossed lovers from District Twelve
The most I could say about you after your interview was that you were nice enough although that in itself was a small miracle
Now I can say youre a heartbreaker
Oh oh oh how the boys back home fall longingly at your feet
Which do you think will get you more sponsors
I should have been told so I didnt look so stupid
If youd known it wouldnt have read as real
Shes just worried about her boyfriend
But I bet hes smart enough to know a bluff when he sees it
Besides you didnt say you loved me
After he said he loved me did you think I could be in love with him too
The way you avoided looking at the cameras the blush
Youre going to have sponsors lined up around the block
I wouldnt be at all surprised if I finally get promoted to a decent district next year
When the gong sounds get the hell out of there
Youre neither of you up to the blood bath at the Cornucopia
Just clear out put as much distance as you can between yourselves and the others and find a source of water
You should be getting some sleep
I didnt want to miss the party
With all the crazy clothes they wear here
All I can do is wonder about tomorrow
I really am sorry about your hands
Ive never been a contender in these Games anyway
Thats no way to be thinking
My best hope is to not disgrace myself and
I dont know how to say it exactly
I want to die as myself
I dont want them to change me in there
Turn me into some kind of monster that Im not
Do you mean you wont kill anyone
No when the time comes Im sure Ill kill just like everybody else
I cant go down without a fight
Only I keep wishing I could think of a way to
to show the Capitol they dont own me
That Im more than just a piece in their Games
Okay but within that framework theres still you theres still me
no offense but who cares Peeta
I mean what else am I allowed to care about at this point
Look if you want to spend the last hours of your life planning some noble death in the arena thats your choice
I want to spend mine in District Twelve
Wouldnt surprise me if you do
Give my mother my best when you make it back will you
The material in the jackets designed to reflect body heat
Off the green outfit you wore on the train
It barely cleared the review board
Some thought the pin could be used as a weapon giving you an unfair advantage
But eventually they let it through
They eliminated a ring from that District One girl though
If you twisted the gemstone a spike popped out
She claimed she had no knowledge the ring transformed and there was no way to prove she did
Then theres nothing to do but wait for the call
Unless you think you could eat any more
Do you want to talk Katniss
Im not allowed to bet but if I could my money would be on you
Ladies and gentlemen let the Seventyfourth Hunger Games begin
Just clear out put as much distance as you can between yourselves and the others and find a source of water
Twelve down and eleven to go
Better clear out so they can get the body before it starts stinking
Shouldnt we have heard a cannon by now
Nothing to prevent them from going in immediately
Yeah we dont want to have to track her down twice
Ill go finish her and lets move on
Why dont we just kill him now and get it over with
And hes handy with that knife
Besides hes our best chance of finding her
You think she bought into that sappy romance stuff
Every time I think about her spinning around in that dress I want to puke
Wish we knew how she got that eleven
Katniss the girl who was on fire
Its been a bit warm for my taste
Why dont you come on up
Ill do better with my sword
Oh let her stay up there
Its not like shes going anywhere
Well deal with her in the morning
What are you still doing here
We could do it you know
You and I we could make it
You know theyre not the only ones who can form alliances
You want me for an ally
You saved me with those tracker jackers
Youre smart enough to still be alive
And I cant seem to shake you anyway
Come on then Ive had two kills today
We all carry them when we work in the orchards
They left a lot of nests there
There are a lot here too
That must be how you can fly around the trees like youve got wings
Lucky you had the sense to pull the stingers out or youd be a lot worse
The closer we get to the end the more people will realize how clever you are
You werent joking about wanting me for an ally
Ive never had a whole leg to myself before
Now that Ive got a bow and arrows I can get more
I can show you how to set them
It will only keep a few days anyway and weve got the whole bird plus the rabbit
Id have thought in District Eleven youd have a bit more to eat than us
You know since you grow the food
Oh no were not allowed to eat the crops
They whip you and make everyone else watch
The mayors very strict about it
Do you get all the coal you want
Just what we buy and whatever we track in on our boots
They feed us a bit extra during harvest so that people can keep going longer
Dont you have to be in school
Oh yes we have them back home
Ive been eating them for days
but I had to get away from the Cornucopia fast
They dont block the sun and they make it harder to see
These arent for sun theyre for darkness
Sometimes when we harvest through the night theyll pass out a few pairs to those of us highest in the trees
One time this boy Martin he tried to keep his pair
They killed him on the spot
They killed a boy for taking these
Yes and everyone knew he was no danger
Martin wasnt right in the head
I mean he still acted like a threeyearold
He just wanted the glasses to play with
They let you see in complete darkness
Try them tonight when the sun goes down
I have these for my hands
You can share my sleeping bag if you want
Rue I only woke up today
How many nights did I miss
The girls from Districts One and Four are dead
At least I think it did
It might have been the tracker jacker venom making me imagine things
You know the boy from my district
I think he saved my life
But he was with the Careers
Ive spied on their base camp by the lake
They made it back before they collapsed from the stingers
Maybe he did save you and had to run
If he did it was all probably just part of his act
You know to make people think hes in love with me
I didnt think that was an act
He worked it out with our mentor
I wonder who else got a pair of these
But theyve got everything down by the lake
I mean its the Hunger Games right
I think were going to have to fix that Rue
Who do you think that was
It could have been any of the others
Wait and the boy from Ten the one with the bad leg
I wonder how that last one died
Theres a marshy area over that way
Today we take out the Careers food
Come on well figure out a plan while we hunt
Yes he stays at the camp fulltime
He got stung too when they drew the tracker jackers in by the lake
I guess they agreed to let him live if he acted as their guard
Not much that I could see
He might be able to hold a few of us off with that but Thresh could kill him easily
And the foods just out in the open
Somethings not quite right about that whole setup
But I couldnt tell what exactly
Katniss even if you could get to the food how would you get rid of it
Dont worry Ill think of something
Destroying things is much easier than making them
You have a lot of time for that
Thats why I love your pin
I have a few that are my special friends
We can sing back and forth for hours
Im usually up highest so Im the first to see the flag that signals quitting time
Theres a special little song I do
And the mockingjays spread it around the orchard
Thats how everyone knows to knock off
They can be dangerous though if you get too near their nests
But you cant blame them for that
It has more meaning for you than me
I like to see it on you
Thats how I decided I could trust you
Maybe you should just stick with that
Not if I pick up another bag down by the lake
You know stealing isnt illegal here
But if you hear the mockingjays singing it youll know Im okay only I cant get back right away
If all goes according to plan Ill see you for dinner
We need him in the woods and his jobs done here anyway
No one can touch those supplies
I keep telling you forget about him
I know where I cut him
Its a miracle he hasnt bled to death yet
At any rate hes in no shape to raid us
When we find her I kill her in my own way and no one interferes
Going to win for both of us now
Only I keep wishing I could think of a way to
to show the Capital they dont own me
That Im more than just a piece in their Games
We dont have to worry about her now
My thanks to the people of District Eleven
Now you have to sit up Katniss
Now you have to drink water Katniss
Now you have to sort the packs Katniss
How different can it be really
You here to finish me off sweetheart
I guess all those hours decorating cakes paid off
The final defense of the dying
Were on the same team now you know
Nice of you to find whats left of me
Lets get you in the stream wash you off so I can see what kind of wounds youve got
Remember were madly in love so its all right to kiss me anytime you feel like it
Thanks Ill keep it in mind
Look Peeta Im going to roll you into the stream
Im not going to put you all the way in
Keep an eye on the woods for me okay
Its funny I havent been hungry for days
Peeta we need to get some food in you
Itll just come right back up
I need to look at your leg first
You should see some of the people they bring my mother from the mines
First thing is to clean it well
Why dont we give it some air and then
And then youll patch it up
In the meantime you eat these
Were going to have to experiment some
Ive no idea what Im doing and I hate pus
Killing things is much easier than this
Although for all I know I am killing you
Can you speed it up a little
Shut up and eat your pears
Maybe Ill put some of the burn ointment on it
I think it helps with infection anyway
Here cover yourself with this and Ill wash your shorts
Oh I dont care if you see me
Youre just like the rest of my family
You know youre kind of squeamish for such a lethal person
I wish Id let you give Haymitch a shower after all
Whats he sent you so far
I always knew you were his favorite
Please he cant stand being in the same room with me
Peeta weve got to go now
Somewhere we can hide you until youre stronger
You would have found me if you could
Look if I dont make it back
I didnt drain all that pus for nothing
But just in case I dont
No Peeta I dont even want to discuss it
Youre supposed to be in love sweetheart
Give me something I can work with
Peeta look what Haymitch has sent you
I woke up and you were gone
Have you taken a look at yourself lately
I thought Cato and Clove might have found you
They like to hunt at night
Yes theres just them and us and Thresh and Foxface
Thats what I nicknamed the girl from Five
This is an enormous improvement over the mud
Clean clothes and medicine and a sleeping bag
No more kisses for you until youve eaten
Ill wake you if anything happens
Katniss you cant stay up forever
But just for a few hours
Peeta you were supposed to wake me after a couple of hours
Besides I like watching you sleep
Well theres more swelling but the pus is gone
I know what blood poisoning is Katniss
Even if my mother isnt a healer
Youre just going to have to outlast the others Peeta
Theyll cure it back at the Capitol when we win
Im going to make you soup
Tell me about the happiest day you can remember
Did I ever tell you about how I got Prims goat
I want that goat for Prim
We better take a closer look
She goes to the butcher soon
Hardly anyone will buy her milk and then they only pay half price
Whats the butcher giving for her
Girls got her eye on your goat
Bet you half the carcass will be too rotten for even sausage
We had a deal on an animal with a few teeth marks
Sell her to the girl if shes stupid enough to take her
That thing couldnt have died if it tried
Only I remember that night Prim insisted on sleeping with Lady on a blanket next to the fire
And just before they drifted off the goat licked her cheek like it was giving her a good night kiss or something
It was already mad about her
Was it still wearing the pink ribbon
Im just trying to get a picture
I can see why that day made you happy
Well I knew that goat would be a little gold mine
Yes of course I was referring to that not the lasting joy you gave the sister you love so much you took her place in the reaping
The goat has paid for itself
Well it wouldnt dare do anything else after you saved its life
I intend to do the same thing
What did you cost me again
Some of you may already be declining my invitation
But this is no ordinary feast
Each of you needs something desperately
Each of you will find that something in a backpack marked with your district number at the Cornucopia at dawn
Think hard about refusing to show up
For some of you this will be your last chance
Youre not risking your life for me
Do you think Im running straight into some freeforall against Cato and Clove and Thresh
Ill let them fight it out well see whos in the sky tomorrow night and work out a plan from there
Youre such a bad liar Katniss
I dont know how youve survived this long
All right I am going and you cant stop me
I may not make it to the Cornucopia but if Im yelling your name I bet someone can find me
And then Ill be dead for sure
You wont get a hundred yards from here on that leg
You go and Im going too
What am I supposed to do
Sit here and watch you die
If you promise not to go
Then you have to do what I say
Drink your water wake me when I tell you and eat every bite of the soup no matter how disgusting it is
I found a new patch of berries a little farther downstream
My mother makes jam from them
Havent you ever had them before
Well you cant get them in the market much they only grow wild
Cato knows where he cut him
Youve probably got him strapped up in some tree while you try to keep his heart going
Whats in the pretty little backpack
Too bad hell never get it
I promised Cato if he let me have you Id give the audience a good show
Just like we did your pathetic little ally
The one who hopped around in the trees
Well first Rue then you and then I think well just let nature take care of Lover Boy
I think well start with your mouth
Yes I dont think youll have much use for your lips anymore
Want to blow Lover Boy one last kiss
Whatd you do to that little girl
You cut her up like you were going to cut up this girl here
I tried to save her I did
And I sang her to sleep
Just this one time I let you go
You and me were even then
You better run now Fire Girl
Good to see your eyes again
How long have I been out
I woke up yesterday evening and you were lying next to me in a very scary pool of blood
I think its stopped finally but I wouldnt sit up or anything
Whatever you shot into my arm did the trick
By this morning almost all the swelling in my leg was gone
Im sorry to say I gobbled down three pieces of that groosling before I realized it might have to last a while
Dont worry Im back on a strict diet
You just let me take care of you for a while
Your boots and socks are still damp and the weathers not helping much
I wonder what brought on this storm
Foxface will be in her den somewhere and Clove
I saw it in the sky last night
Thresh broke her skull with a rock
Lucky he didnt catch you too
He let you go because he didnt want to owe you anything
I dont expect you to understand it
But if youd lived in the Seam I wouldnt have to explain
Obviously Im too dim to get it
How I never seem to get over owing you for that
I think we can let that go
I mean you just brought me back from the dead
Besides its the first gift thats always the hardest to pay back
I wouldnt even have been here to do it if you hadnt helped me then
Haymitch said you would take a lot of convincing
Whats he got to do with it
I guess its too much to hope that theyll simultaneously destroy each other
I think we would like Thresh
I think hed be our friend back in District Twelve
Then lets hope Cato kills him so we dont have to
Are you in a lot of pain
I want to go home Peeta
I want to go home now
You go back to sleep and dream of home
And youll be there for real before you know it
Wake me if you need me to keep watch
Im good and rested thanks to you and Haymitch
Besides who knows how long this will last
Should we try and ration it
The grooslings getting old anyway and the last thing we need is to get sick off spoilt food
I wont be much help with that
I wish there was some sort of bread bush out there
The bread they sent me from District Eleven was still warm
I mean whats on the far side of the circle
As far as you can see its full of grasses as high as my shoulders
I dont know maybe some of them are grain
There are patches of different colors
I bet some of them are grain
I bet Thresh knows which ones too
Nobody really wanted to track Thresh down in that grass
It has a sinister feeling to it
Every time I look at that field all I can think of are hidden things
Snakes and rabid animals and quicksand
There could be anything in there
Maybe there is a bread bush in that field
Maybe thats why Thresh looks better fed now than when we started the Games
Either that or hes got very generous sponsors
I wonder what wed have to do to get Haymitch to send us some bread
Well he probably used up a lot of resources helping me knock you out
Dont try something like that again
The problem is were both still alive
Which only reinforces the idea in your mind that you did the right thing
I did do the right thing
You wont be doing me any favors
Maybe I did it for myself Peeta did you ever think of that
Maybe you arent the only one who
what it would be like if
Thats exactly the kind of topic Haymitch told me to steer clear of
Then Ill just have to fill in the blanks myself
I think your wound is bleeding again
Come on lie down its bedtime anyway
Tomorrow when its dry Ill find us a place so high in the trees we can both sleep in peace
You said at the interview youd had a crush on me forever
I guess the first day of school
You had on a red plaid dress and your hair
it was in two braids instead of one
My father pointed you out when we were waiting to line up
He said See that little girl
I wanted to marry her mother but she ran off with a coal miner
And I said A coal miner
Why did she want a coal miner if she couldve had you
And he said Because when he sings
even the birds stop to listen
So that day in music assembly the teacher asked who knew the valley song
Your hand shot right up in the air
She stood you up on a stool and had you sing it for us
And I swear every bird outside the windows fell silent
And right when your song ended I knew just like your motherI was a goner
Then for the next eleven years I tried to work up the nerve to talk to you
So in a way my name being drawn in the reaping was a real piece of luck
Youre the one who wasnt paying attention
Well I dont have much competition here
You dont have much competition anywhere
I guess Haymitch finally got tired of watching us starve
Yes thats what Im looking lot sweetheart
We better take it slow on that stew
Remember the first night on the train
The rich food made me sick and I wasnt even starving then
And I could just inhale the whole thing
We wait an hour if it stays down then we get another serving
Its going to be a long hour
What was that you were saying just before the food arrived
best thing that ever happened to you
I dont remember that last part
So since we were five you never even noticed any other girls
No I noticed just about every girl but none of them made a lasting impression but you
Im sure that would thrill your parents you liking a girl from the Seam
Anyway if we make it back you wont be a girl from the Seam youll be a girl from the Victors Village
But then our only neighbor will be Haymitch
Picnics birthdays long winter nights around the fire retelling old Hunger Games tales
I told you he hates me
When hes sober Ive never heard him say one negative thing about you
But thats mainly because you didnt try to run when he set you on fire
well if I were you Id avoid Haymitch completely
I thought you said I was his favorite
I dont think people in general are his sort of thing
How do you think he did it
How do you think he won the Games
There wont be anything to see tonight
Nothings happened or we wouldve heard a cannon
Should we split another roll too
But Ill save the cheese for tomorrow
They must have fired the cannon during the thunder and we missed it
I mean its pouring buckets out there
I dont know how you can see anything
But this means were one step closer to District Twelve
It also means Cato will be back hunting us
Because Thresh would have never gone down without a fight
Hes so strong I mean he was
And they were in his territory
The more wounded Cato is the better
I wonder how Foxface is making out
Probably be easier to catch Cato than her
Maybe theyll catch each other and we can just go home
But we better be extra careful about the watches
I dozed off a few times
We make a goat cheese and apple tart at the bakery
Too expensive for my family to eat
Of course practically everything we eat is stale
So do we hunt on empty stomachs to give us an edge
We stuff ourselves to give us staying power
I can feel Effie Trinket shuddering at my manners
Cato could be right outside our cave
Ive got you to protect me now
Hell be hunting us by now
Cato isnt one to wait for his prey to wander by
If he can move hes coming
If we want food we better head back up to my old hunting grounds
Just tell me what you need me to do
Stay on the rocks as much as possible no sense in leaving him tracks to follow
And listen for both of us
Youve got to move more quietly
Forget about Cato youre chasing off every rabbit in a tenmile radius
Can you take your boots off
That way well both be quieter
I know Im chasing away the game
So why dont you go on
Show me some plants to gather and that way well both be useful
Not if Cato comes and kills you
I fought him before didnt I
What if you climbed up in a tree and acted as a lookout while I hunted
What if you show me whats edible around here and go get us some meat
Just dont go far in case you need help
Youre supposed to be here not running around in the woods
I found some berries down by the stream
The waters too loud I guess
If two people agree on a signal they stay in range
Because if one of them doesnt answer theyre in trouble all right
Because thats what happened with Rue and I watched her die
Oh and I suppose the apples ate the cheese
I dont know what ate the cheese
Ive been down by the stream collecting berries
Youll be dead before they reach your stomach
Hell be here in a second
Well stand a better chance fighting him from above
No Peeta shes your kill not Catos
I havent even seen her since the first day
How could I have killed her
I wonder how she found us
My fault I guess if Im as loud as you say
I mean we would have both been dead too if she hadnt eaten the berries first
I really thought they were the same ones youd gathered
It just means were one step closer to home right
Ill get rid of the rest
If they fooled Foxface maybe they can fool Cato as well
If hes chasing us or something we can act like we accidentally drop the pouch and if he eats them
Hell know where we are now
If he was anywhere nearby and saw that hovercraft hell know we killed her and come after us
Are you ready to face him
Better to cook our food while we have the chance
If he knows were here he knows
But he also knows theres two of us and probably assumes we were hunting Foxface
And the fire means were not hiding were inviting him here
I cant climb like you Katniss especially with my leg and I dont think I could ever fall asleep fifty feet above the ground
Its not safe to stay in the open Peeta
Cant we go back to the cave
Its near water and easy to defend
Lets go back to the cave
Thats not fair Katniss you should have woken me
Wake me if anything interesting happens
No hes keeping a disturbingly low profile
How long do you think well have before the Gamemakers drive us together
Well Foxface died almost a day ago so theres been plenty of time for the audience to place bets and get bored
I guess it could happen at any moment
Yeah I have a feeling todays the day
I wonder how theyll do it
Well until they do no sense in wasting a hunting day
But we should probably eat as much as we can hold just in case we run into trouble
They must have drained it while we slept
Thats where they want us to go
Maybe the ponds still have some
Theyre driving us to the lake
Do you want to go straightaway or wait until the waters tapped out
Lets go now while weve had food and rest
Lets just go end this thing
Should be a piece of cake
Next time we eat it will be in the Capitol
We dont want to fight him after dark
Theres only the one pair of glasses
Maybe thats what hes waiting for
What do you want to do
Either that or find a tree
But lets give him another half an hour or so
Hes got some kind of body armor
He said Can they climb it
What did they do to them
those could be their real eyes
Shoot me and he goes down with me
Cato may win this thing yet
Why dont they just kill him
My last arrows in your tourniquet
Maybe we have to move away from it
Think you could make it to the lake
Greetings to the final contestants of the Seventyfourth Hunger Games
The earlier revision has been revoked
Closer examination of the rule book has disclosed that only one winner may be allowed
Good luck and may the odds be ever in your favor
If you think about it its not that surprising
Before they send those mutts back or something
I dont want to die like Cato
You shoot me and go home and live with it
Youre not leaving me here alone
We both know they have to have a victor
It can only be one of us
Ladies and gentlemen I am pleased to present the victors of the Seventyfourth Hunger Games Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark
I give you the tributes of District Twelve
Guess Id be dead by now if I did
He is all right isnt he
Only they want to do your reunion live on air at the ceremony
I guess Id want to see that myself
He has to get you ready
They dont want it all coming back up on the stage
Oh they did a full body polish on you
Not a flaw left on your skin
I had just had my eyebrows dyed
Have you given up the whole girl on fire thing
But the Gamemakers wanted to alter you surgically
Haymitch had a huge fight with them over it
I think its the best yet
I thought itd be something more
I thought Peeta would like this better
Lets have a look at you
How about a hug for luck
Word is the Capitols furious about you showing them up in the arena
The one thing they cant stand is being laughed at and theyre the joke of Panem
Your only defense can be you were so madly in love you werent responsible for your actions
Since when does it matter what I think
Why cant I talk to him
Plenty of time for talk when we get home
Go to bed youre on air at two
Were going to have a fabulous time
Im not good at talking about myself
Nothing you say will be wrong
I hardly get to see you
Haymitch seems bent on keeping us apart
Yes hes gotten very responsible lately
Well theres just this and we go home
Then he cant watch us all the time
Oh go ahead and curl up next to him if you want
Well Peeta we know from our days in the cave that it was love at first sight for you from what age five
From the moment I laid eyes on her
But Katniss what a ride for you
I think the real excitement for the audience was watching you fall for him
When did you realize you were in love with him
Well I know when it hit me
The night when you shouted out his name from that tree
Yes I guess that was it
I mean until that point I just tried not to think about what my feelings might be honestly because it was so confusing and it only made things worse if I actually cared about him
But then in the tree everything changed
Why do you think that was
there was a chance I could keep him
So now that youve got me what are you going to do with me
Put you somewhere you cant get hurt
Yes its your fault Im alive
Hed have bled to death for sure without it
Katniss I know youve had a shock but Ive got to ask
The moment when you pulled out those berries
What was going on in your mind
I think that goes for both of us
Just keep it up in the district until the cameras are gone
They didnt like our stunt with the berries
So Haymitch has been coaching me through the last few days
So I didnt make it worse
He knew you were smart enough to get it right
I didnt know there was anything to get right
So what youre saying is these last few days and then I guess
that was just some strategy you two worked out
I mean I couldnt even talk to him in the arena could I
But you knew what he wanted you to do didnt you
It was all for the Games
I guess the real question is whats going to be left when we get home
The closer we get to District Twelve the more confused I get
Well let me know when you work it out
